main event: A large white sphere was sighted from Coast Guard Cutter PONT BRIGHT about 40 miles west of Wake Island on 19 June 1962.
interesting points: The sphere remained stationary for about 5 minutes before taking off in a straight line at an estimated speed of about 500 knots., The diameter of the sphere was about 7-8 feet, with no visible engine or wings., The object was observed through 7x50 binoculars from an elevation of about 15-20 degrees., The sighting occurred over a period of approximately 5 minutes., It was reported as a UFO by the Coast Guard crew.
witness description: Coast Guard personnel aboard Cutter PONT BRIGHT
